definition: (coll.) to ride in sb else's car to save money/to ride on a train or bus without buying a ticket (fare-dodging)
to rub against/to walk slowly/(coll.) to freeload
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: As long as he was headed in the direction I wanted to go, I was willing to ride.
sentences.chinese: 只要他朝我要去的方向開，我就願意繼續蹭車。
